traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15) and must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the mind flayer. The target takes 55 (10d10 damage) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The mind flayer magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4 damage) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The mind flayer is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}; {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
